sqlMap.select:
SELECT RSRV_ID, SABUN, convert(nchar(10), RSRV_DT, 120) as RSRV_DT FROM [TB_OA_RSRV] WHERE
CONVERT(nchar(8), RSRV_DT, 120) BETWEEN CONVERT(DATE, #date#) AND DATEADD(DD, 5, CONVERT(DATE, #date#)) AND DEL_FLAG='N' ORDER BY RSRV_ID DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [TB_OA_RSRV] WHERE RSRV_DT IN (#rsrv_dt#) AND DEL_FLAG = 'N'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_OA_RSRV SET APRV_STATUS = #aprv_status#, DEL_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE RSRV_ID = #rsrv_id#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT COALESCE(max(RSRV_ID), 0)+1 FROM TB_OA_RSRV
INSERT INTO TB_OA_RSRV ( RSRV_ID, SABUN, PLACE_ID, RSRV_DT, SUBJECT, PEOPLE_CNT, REG_DTTM, DEL_FLAG, APRV_STATUS ) VALUES ( #rsrv_id#, #sabun#, #place_id#, #rsrv_dt#, #subject#, #people_cnt#, getDate(), 'N', 'R' )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.RSRV_ID, a.SABUN, convert(nchar(10), a.RSRV_DT, 120) as RSRV_DT, a.SUBJECT, a.PEOPLE_CNT, a.APRV_STATUS, b.name as user_name, b.telno as user_tel FROM TB_OA_RSRV a, tbSVC_TDMSEMP b WHERE
a.RSRV_ID =#rsrv_id# AND a.DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND a.SABUN = b.empno

SELECT a.RSRV_ID, a.SABUN, SUBSTRING(RSRV_DT,1,4)+'년 '+SUBSTRING(RSRV_DT,5,2)+'월 '+SUBSTRING(RSRV_DT,7,2)+'일 '+SUBSTRING(RSRV_DT,9,2)+'시' AS RSRV_DT, a.SUBJECT, a.PEOPLE_CNT, a.APRV_STATUS, b.name as user_name, b.telno as user_tel, CASE a.APRV_STATUS WHEN 'R' THEN '신청' WHEN 'Y' THEN '진행중' WHEN 'A' THEN '완료' WHEN 'C' THEN '취소' END APRV_STATUS_NM FROM TB_OA_RSRV a, tbSVC_TDMSEMP b WHERE
a.SABUN =#sabun# AND a.SABUN = b.empno order by a.RSRV_DT desc OFFSET (#pageNo# - 1) * #perPageCnt# ROWS FETCH NEXT #perPageCnt# ROWS ONLY

SELECT count(*) as totalCnt FROM TB_OA_RSRV WHERE
SABUN =#sabun#
